title: Share of students at end of lower secondary education achieving minimum maths proficiency, 2010-2015
subtitle: Percentage of students at end of lower secondary education achieving at least a minimum proficiency level in mathematics, as per nationally representative learning assessments (most recent assessment in the period 2010-2015). The minimum proficiency level in reading and mathematics is as defined by each assessment. Data need to be interpreted with caution since the different assessments are not comparable.

dimensions.displayName: Percentage of students achieving minimum proficiency in country-specific mathematics exam
